chapter.text: 23|1|saphal ho gaye eemaan vaale.
23|2|jo apanee namaazon mein vineet rahane vaale hain.
23|3|aur jo vyarth[1] se vimukh rahane vaale hain.
23|4|tatha jo zakaat dene vaale hain.
23|5|aur jo apane guptaangon kee raksha karane vaale hain.
23|6|parantu apanee patniyon tatha apane svaamitv mein aayee daasiyon se, to vahee nindit nahin hain.
23|7|phir jo isake atirikt chaahen, to vahee ullanghanakaaree hain.
23|8|aur jo apanee dharoharon tatha vachan ka paalan karane vaale hain.
23|9|tatha jo apanee namaazon kee raksha karane vaale hain.
23|10|yahee uttaraadhikaaree hain.
23|11|jo uttaraadhikaaree honge firdaus[1] ke, jisamen ve sadaavaasee honge.
23|12|aur hamane utpann kiya hai manushy ko mittee ke saar[1] se.
23|13|phir hamane use veery banaakar rakh diya ek surakshit sthaan[1] mein.

23|14|phir badal diya veery ko jame hue rakt mein, phir hamane use maans ka lothada bana diya, phir hamane lothade mein haddiyaan banaayeen, phir hamane pahana diya haddiyon ko maans, phir use ek any roop mein utpann kar diya. to shubh hai allaah, jo sabase achchhee utpatti karane vaala hai.
23|15|phir tumasab isake pashchaat avashy marane vaale ho.
23|16|phir nishchay tumasab (pralay) ke din jeevit kiye jaoge.
23|17|aur hamane bana diye tumhaare oopar saat aakaash aur ham utpatti se achet nahin[1] hain.
23|18|aur hamane aakaash se uchit maatra mein paanee barasaaya aur use dharatee mein rok diya tatha ham use vilupt kar dene par nishchay saamarthyavaan hain.
23|19|phir hamane upaja diye tumhaare lie us (paanee) ke dvaara khajooron tatha angooron ke baag, tumhaare lie usamen bahut-se phal hain aur useemen se tum khaate ho.
23|20|tatha vrksh jo nikalata hai saina parvat se, jo tel lie ugata hai tatha saalan hai khaane vaalon ke lie.

23|21|aur vaastav mein, tumhaare lie pashuon mein ek shiksha hai, ham tumhen pilaate hain, usamen se, jo unake peton mein[1] hai tatha tumhaare lie unamen any bahut-se laabh hain aur unamen se kuchh ko tum khaate ho.
23|22|tatha unapar aur naavon par tum savaar kiye jaate ho.
23|23|tatha hamane bheja nooh[1] ko usakee jaati kee or, usane kahaah he meree jaati ko logo! ibaadat (vandana) allaah kee karo, tumhaara koee poojy nahin hai usake siva, to kya tum darate nahin ho

23|24|to un pramukhon ne kaha, jo kaafir ho gaye usakee jaati mein se, ye to ek manushy hai, tumhaare jaisa, ye tumapar pradhaanata chaahata hai aur yadi allaah chaahata, to kisee farishte ko utaarata, hamane to ise[1] suna hee nahin apane poorvajon mein.
23|25|ye bas ek aisa purush hai, jo paagal ho gaya hai, to tum usakee prateeksha karo kuchh samay tak.
23|26|nooh ne kahaah he mere paalanahaar! meree sahaayata kar, unake mujhe jhuthalaane par.

23|27|to hamane usakee or vahyee kee ki naav bana hamaaree raksha mein hamaaree vahyee ke anusaar aur jab hamaara aadesh aa jaaye tatha tannoor ubal pade, to rakh le pratyek jeev ke ek-ek jode tatha apane parivaar ko, usake siva jisapar pahale nirnay ho chuka hai unamen se, aur mujhe sambodhit na karana unake vishay mein jinhonne atyaachaar kiye hain, nishchay ve dubo diye jaayenge.
23|28|aur jab sthir ho jaaye too aur jo tere saathee hain naav par, to kahah sab prashansa us allaah ke lie hai, jisane hamen mukt kiya atyaachaaree logon se.
23|29|tatha kahah he mere paalanahaar! mujhe shubh sthaan mein utaar aur too uttam sthaan dene vaala hai.
23|30|nishchay isamen kaee nishaaniyaan hain tatha nihsandeh ham pareeksh lene[1] vaale hain.
23|31|phir hamane paida kiya unake pashchaat doosare samudaay ko.
23|32|phir hamane bheja unamen rasool unheen mein se ki tum ibaadat (vandana) karo allaah kee, tumhaara koee ( sachcha) poojy nahin hai usake siva, to kya tum darate nahin ho

23|33|aur usakee jaati ke pramukhon ne kaha, jo kaafir ho gaye tatha aakhirat (paralok) ka saamana karane ko jhuthala diya tatha hamane unhen sampann kiya tha, saansaarik jeevan mein: ye to bas ek manushy hai tumhaare jaisa, khaata hai, jo tum khaate ho aur peeta hai, jo tum peete ho.
23|34|aur yadi tumane maan liya apane jaise ek manuj ko, to nishchay tum kshatigrast ho.
23|35|kya vah tumhen vachan deta hai ki jab tum mar jaoge aur dhool tatha haddiyaan ho jaoge, to tum, phir jeevit nikaale jaoge
23|36|bahut door kee baat hai, jisaka tumhen vachan diya ja raha hai.
23|37|jeevan to bas saansaarik jeevan hai, ham marate-jeete hain aur ham phir jeevit nahin kiye jaayenge.
23|38|ye to bas ek vyakti hai, jisane allaah par ek jhooth ghad liya hai aur ham usaka vishvaas karane vaale nahin hain.
23|39|nabee ne praarthana keeh mere paalanahaar! meree sahaayata kar, unake jhuthalaane par mujhe.
23|40|(allaah ne) kahaah sheeghr hee ve (apane kiye par) pachhataayenge.
23|41|antatah pakad liya unhen kolaahal ne satyaanusaar aur hamane unhen kachara bana diya, to dooree ho atyaachaariyon ke lie.
23|42|phir hamane paida kiya unake pashchaat doosare yug ke logon ko.
23|43|nahin aage hotee hai, koee jaati apane samay se aur na peechhe[1].

23|44|phir, hamane bheja apane rasoolon ko nirantar, jab-jabakisee samudaay ke paas usaka rasool aaya, unhonne use jhuthala diya, to hamane peechhe laga[1] diya unake, ek ko doosare ke aur unhen kahaanee bana diya. to dooree hai unake lie, jo eemaan nahin laate.
23|45|phir hamane bheja moosa tatha usake bhaee haaroon ko apanee nishaaniyon tatha khule tark ke saath.
23|46|firaun aur usake pramukhon kee or, to unhonne garv kiya tatha ve the hee abhimaanee log.
23|47|unhonne kahaah kya ham eemaan laayen apane jaise do vyaktiyon par, jabaki un donon kee jaati hamaare adheen hai
23|48|to unhonne donon ko jhuthala diy, tatha ho gaye vinaashon mein.
23|49|aur hamane pradaan kee moosa ko pustak[1], taaki ve maargadarshan pa jaayen.
23|50|aur hamane bana diya maryam ke putr tatha usakee maan ko ek nishaanee tatha donon ko sharan dee ek uchch basane yogy tatha pravaahit srot ke sthaan kee or[1].
23|51|he rasoolo! khao svachchh[1] cheezon mein se tatha achchhe karm karo, vaastav mein, main usase, jo tum kar rahe ho, bhalee-bhaanti avagat hoon.
23|52|aur vaastav mein, tumhaara dharm ek hee dharm hai aur main hee tum sabaka paalanahaar hoon, atah mujhee se daro.
23|53|to unhonne khand kar liya, apane dharm ka, aapas mein kaee khand, pratyek sampradaay useemen jo unake paas[1] hai, magan hai.
23|54|atah (he nabee!) aap unhen chhod den, unakee achetana mein kuchh samay tak.
23|55|kya ve samajhate hain ki ham, jo sahaayata kar rahe hain unakee dhan tatha santaan se.
23|56|sheeghrata kar rahe hain unake lie bhalaeeyon mein? balki ve samajhate nahin hain[1].
23|57|vaastav mein, jo apane paalanahaar ke bhay se darane vaale hain.
23|58|aur jo apane paalanahaar kee aayaton par eemaan rakhate hain.
23|59|aur jo apane paalanahaar ka saajhee nahin banaate hain.
23|60|aur jo karate hain, jo kuchh bhee karen aur unake dil kaanpate rahate hain ki ve apane paalanahaar kee or phirakar jaane vaale hain.
23|61|vahee sheeghrata kar rahe hain bhalaeeyon mein tatha vahee unake lie agrasar hain.
23|62|aur ham bojh nahin rakhate kisee praanee par, parantu usake saamarthy ke anusaar tatha hamaare paas ek pustak hai, jo saty bolatee hai aur unapar atyaachaar nahin kiya[1] jaayega.
23|63|balki unake dil achet hain isase tatha unake bahut-se karm hain isake siva, jinhen ve karane vaale hain.
23|64|yahaantak ki jab ham pakad lenge unake sukhiyon ko yaatana mein, to ve vilaap karane lagenge.
23|65|aaj vilaap na karo, nihsandeh tum hamaaree or se sahaayata nahin diye jaoge.
23|66|meree aayaten tumhen sunaayee jaatee raheen, to tum ediyon ke bal phirate rahe.
23|67|abhimaan karate hue, use katha banaakar bakavaas karate rahe.
23|68|kya unhonne is kathan (quraan) par vichaar nahin kiya athava inake paas vah[1] aa gaya, jo unake poorvajon ke paas nahin aaya
23|69|athava vah apane rasool se parichit nahin hue, isalie ve usaka inkaar kar rahe[1] hain
23|70|athava ve kahate hain ki vah paagal hai? balki vah to unake paas saty laaye hain aur unamen se adhiktar ko saty apriy hai.

23|71|aur yadi anusaran karane lage saty unakee manamaanee ka, to ast-vyast ho jaaye aakaash tatha dharatee aur jo unake beech hai, balki hamane de dee hai unhen unakee shiksha, phir (bhee) ve apanee shiksha se vimukh ho rahe hain.
23|72|(he nabee!) kya aap unase kuchh dhan maang rahe hain? aapake lie to aapake paalanahaar ka diya hua hee uttam hai aur vah sarvottam jeevika dene vaala hai.
23|73|nishchay aap to unhen supath kee or bula rahe hain.
23|74|aur jo aakhirat (paralok) par eemaan nahin rakhate, ve supath se kataraane vaale hain.
23|75|aur yadi ham unapar daya karen aur door karen, jo duhkh unake saath hai,[1] to ve apane kukarmon mein aur adhik bahakate jaayenge.
23|76|aur hamane unhen yaatana mein grast (bhee) kiya, to apane paalanahaar ke samaksh nahin jhuke aur na vinay karate hain.
23|77|yahaantak ki jab ham unapar khol denge kadee yaatana ke[1] dvaar, to sahasa ve us samay niraash ho jaayenge[2].
23|78|vahee hai, jisane banaaye hain tumhaare lie kaan tatha aankhen aur dil[1], (phir bhee) tum bahut kam krtagy hote ho.
23|79|aur useene tumhen dharatee mein phailaaya hai aur usee kee or ekatr kiye jaoge.
23|80|tatha vahee hai, jo jeevan deta aur maarata hai aur usee ke adhikaar mein hai raatri tatha din ka pher-badal, to kya tum samajh nahin rakhate
23|81|balki unhonne vahee baat kahee, jo agalon ne kahee.
23|82|unhonne kahaah kya jab ham mar jaayenge aur mittee tatha haddiyaan ho jaayenge, to kya ham phir avashy jeevit kiye jaayenge
23|83|hamen tatha hamaare poorvajon ko isase pahale yahee vachan diya ja chuka hai, ye to bas agalon kee kalpit kathaen hain.
23|84|(he nabee!) unase kahoh kisakee hai dharatee aur jo usamen hai, yadi tum jaanate ho
23|85|ve kahenge ki allaah kee. aap kahieh phir tum kyon shiksha grahan nahin karate
23|86|aap poochhie ki kaun hai saaton aakaashon ka svaamee tatha maha sinhaasan ka svaamee
23|87|ve kahengeh allaah hai. aap kahieh phir tum usase darate kyon nahin ho
23|88|aap unase kahie ki kisake haath mein hai, pratyek vastu ka adhikaar? aur vah sharan deta hai aur use koee sharan nahin de sakata, yadi tum gyaan rakhate ho
23|89|ve avashy kahenge ki (ye sab gun) allaah hee ke hain. aap kahieh phir tumapar kahaan se jaadoo[1] ho jaata hai
23|90|balki hamane unhen saty pahuncha diya hai aur nishchay yahee mithyaavaadee hain.

23|91|allaah ne nahin banaaya hai apanee koee santaan aur na usake saath koee any poojy hai. yadi aisa hota, to pratyek poojy alag ho jaata apanee utpatti ko lekar aur ek-doosare par chadh daudata. pavitr hai allaah un baaton se, jo ye sab log banaate hain.
23|92|vah paroksh (chhupe) tatha pratyaksh (khule) ka gyaanee hai tatha uchch hai, us shirk se, jo ve karate hain.
23|93|(he nabee!) aap praarthana karen ki he mere paalanahaar! yadi too mujhe vah dikhaaye, jisakee unhen dhamakee dee ja rahee hai.
23|94|to mere paalanahaar! mujhe in atyaachaariyon mein sammilit na karana.
23|95|tatha vaastav mein, ham aapako use dikhaane par, jisakee unhen dhamakee dee ja rahee hai, avashy saamarthyavaan hain.
23|96|(he nabee!) aap door karen us (vyavahaar) se jo uttam ho, buraee ko. ham bhalee-bhaanti avagat hain, un baaton se jo ve banaate hain.
23|97|tatha aap praarthana karen ki he mere paalanahaar! main teree sharan maangata hoon, shaitaanon kee shankaon se.
23|98|tatha main teree sharan maangata hoon, mere paalanahaar! ki ve mere paas aayen.
23|99|yahaantak ki jab unamen kisee kee maut aane lage, to kahata haih mere paalanahaar! mujhe (sansaar mein) vaapas kar de[1].

23|100|sambhavatah, main achchha karm karoonga, us (sansaar mein) jise chhod aaya hoon! kadaapi aisa nahin hoga! vah keval ek kathan hai, jise vah kah raha[1] hai aur unake peechhe ek aad[2] hai, unake punah jeevit kiye jaane ke din tak.
23|101|to jab narasingha mein phoonk diya jaayega, to koee sambandh nahin hoga, unake beech, us[1] din aur na ve ek-doosare ko poochhenge.
23|102|phir jisake palade bhaaree honge, vahee saphal hone vaale hain.
23|103|aur jisake palade halk honge, to unhonne hee svayan ko kshatigrast kar liya, (tatha ve) narak mein sadaavaasee honge.
23|104|jhulasa degee unake cheharon ko agni tatha usamen unake jabade (jhulasakar) baahar nikale honge.
23|105|(unase kaha jaayegaah) kya jab meree aayaten tumhen sunaee jaatee theen, to tum unako jhuthalaate nahin the
23|106|ve kahengehhamaare paalanahaar! hamara durbhaagy hamapar chha gaya[1] aur vaastav mein, ham kupath the.
23|107|hamaare paalanahaar! hamen isase nikaal de, yadi ab ham aisa karen, to nishchay ham atyaachaaree honge.
23|108|vah (allaah) kahegaah iseemen apamaanit hokar pade raho aur mujhase baat na karo.
23|109|mere bhakton mein ek samudaay tha, jo kahata tha ki hamaare paalanahaar! ham eemaan laaye. too hamen kshama kar de aur hamapar daya kar aur too sab dayaavaanon se uttam hai.
23|110|to tumane unaka upahaas kiya, yahaan tak ki unhonne tumhen meree yaad bhula dee aur tum unapar hansate rahe.
23|111|mainne unhen aaj badala (pratiphal) de diya hai unake dhairy ka, vaastav mein, vahee saphal hain.
23|112|(allaah) unase kahegaah tum dharatee mein kitane varsh rahe
23|113|ve kahengeh ham ek din ya din ke kuchh bhaag rahe. to ganana karane vaalon se poochh len.
23|114|vah kahegaah tum nahin rahe, parantu bahut kam. kya hee achchha hota ki tumane (pahale hee) jaan liya[1] hota.
23|115|kya tumane samajh rakha hai ki hamane tumhen vyarth paida kiya hai aur tum hamaaree or phir nahin laaye[1] jaoge
23|116|to sarvochch hai allaah vaastavik adhipati. nahin hai koee sachcha poojy, parantu vahee mahimaavaan arsh (sinhaasan) ka svaamee.

23|117|aur jo (bhee) pukaarega allaah ke saath kisee any poojy ko, jisake lie usake paas koee pramaan nahin, to usaka haisaab keval usake paalanahaar ke paas hai, vaastav mein, kaafir saphav nahin[1] honge.
23|118|tatha aap praarthana karen ki mere paalanahaar! too kshama kar tatha daya kar aur too hee sab dayaavaanon se uttam (dayaavaan) hai.
